column1: #Text=Why get into a cab with an actual licensed and insured driver, when you can get into a private car, driven by someone without a background check, with only the minimum insurance, and at best, a sketchy knowledge of where to go, or a out of date GPS.Lost something in an Uber car?
#Text=good luck tracking it, it's gone.Why stop at taxis?
#Text=How about Uber lawyers, Uber Doctors, Uber Pharmacists, etc.Why have regulated pricing, when the market can decide!
